ComicInfo.Writer: Alfred Trujillo, Wendy Steen Shaner, Mickael Shoemaker, CB Zane
ComicInfo.Inker: Luca Spampinato, Stef Wilson, Trevor Grace, Justin Hunt, CICADA
ComicInfo.Colorist: Lampbo Chun, Kerry Anne, Cara Nicole, Chuck Michael, Ivanna Matilla, Noir Art House
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: David Harrigan, CB Zane, Stef Wilson, Lampbo Chun, Alfred Trujilo, Tom Capung
ComicInfo.Summary:
In a far-away universe, Nebula Pearl, a ship full of anthropomorphic aliens operates off of their sex workers aboard. Kitten, the new girl in training has her life shaken when she accidentally kills and eats a client whom she was supposed to entertain while her shipmates make deals at a nearby space station.
Kittenâ€™s problems compound when she discovers that not only is her client a high security officer but that her shipmates are interstellar cannibals.
